thread.section_title: RETRO EUROPE opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre RETRO EUROPE | www.retroeurope.com
thread.title: United Kingdom
thread.title_full: RETRO EUROPE evaluado por United Kingdom

author: United Kingdom
title: United Kingdom
text: The third chair I have purchased and have recommended RetroEurope to friends and family. Small problem with the delivery driver delivering to house number 9 and not number 6! but Retro customer service were helpful and proactive in tracking my package down. I sit in my new chair a happy customer.
